metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29221 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Smarty is a template engine for PHP, facilitating the separation ofpresentation (HTML/CSS) from application logic. Prior to versions 3.1.45and 4.1.1, template authors could inject php code by choosing a malicious{block} name or {include} file name. Sites that cannot fully trust templateauthors should upgrade to versions 3.1.45 or 4.1.1 to receive a patch forthis issue. There are currently no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
